title: Rioto plz fix my account
body:
I have had a bug on my account for a while now. It shows my game time as much longer than it actually is. I often get messages from my friends saying things like: "Wow, you're in a two hour game!?" Is there any way you could fix this and maybe send me some rp for my troubles? ;)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Don't ask for RP in return for them doing work to improve the game you're playing for free.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Gxr3e2bU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-10T21:17:33.540+0000)
>
> Don't ask for RP in return for them doing work to improve the game you're playing for free.

Just messing around... hence the {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
what the heck.. zilean has cursed me! Even seconds after I post this it says it was posted 2 hours ago!!!!
